subject: Law
title: Rescission and Restitution
description: Learn Rescission and Restitution in one minute.

hook.text: You discover the car you bought was in a flood. You want to undo the entire deal. That's rescission.

buildup.text: Rescission cancels the contract and returns both parties to their pre-contract positions.

discovery.text: Restitution requires returning any benefits received. You give back the car; the seller refunds your money.

twist.text: Rescission is available for fraud, mutual mistake, or failure of considerationâ€”not just any breach.

climax.text: You must act promptly. Using the item extensively after discovering the defect can waive your right to rescind.

punchline.text: Rescission rewinds the deal. Restitution makes it fair.

quiz.question: What does rescission do to a contract?
options: Cancels it and restores both parties to their original positions
